multimonster.transporter
Interface TransporterFacade

All Superinterfaces:
Pluggable, SettingListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
TransporterImplBean
public interface TransporterFacade
extends SettingListener, Pluggable

The transporter component. It manages the dataflow in the system. The transporter takes control commands from the proxy and does the appropriate operation (e. g. stop, pause, ...)

Author:
Jörg Meier

public Pipe output(MOIdentifier mOId,
                   FormatId fId,
                   ProtocolId protocolId)
            throws TransporterException
Prepares the system for an output operation with the given parameters. When the call returns the Pipe contains the data requested to read.
